```{r}
b<-read.csv("matrix.csv")

head(b)
a<-as.matrix(b[1:429,2:7])
A<-t(a)%*%a
A
eigen(A)
```

```{r}
u1<-svd(A)$u[,1]/norm(svd(A)$u[,1],'2') #normalized dominate eigenvector
u2<-svd(A)$u[,2]/norm(svd(A)$u[,2], '2') #normalized second eigenvector
eigenvalues <- svd(A)$d
head(u1)
plot(u1,u2) +
text(u1, u2, label = b$person)
```

```{r}
eigenvalues^2/sum(eigenvalues^2)
```
```{r}
v1 <- eigen(a%*%t(a))$vectors[,1]/norm(eigen(a%*%t(a))$vectors[,1],'2') #normalized v1
v2 <- eigen(a%*%t(a))$vectors[,2]/norm(eigen(a%*%t(a))$vectors[,2],'2') #normalized v2
```
